languages.text: Лифт, ведущий в обсерваториум, заблокирован. Чтобы попасть на командный мостик, необходимо понять, как снять блокировку, и добиться того, чтобы корабельная система подчинилась приказам Паскаля.
The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.
languages.original_text: Лифт, ведущий в обсерваториум, заблокирован. Чтобы попасть на командный мостик, необходимо понять, как снять блокировку, и добиться того, чтобы корабельная система подчинилась приказам Паскаля.

traits.locale_text: The elevator up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.
The elevator up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.
The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.
The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.

languages.text: L'ascenseur qui permet d'accéder à l'observatorium est bloqué. Pour atteindre la passerelle du vaisseau, les visiteurs vont devoir trouver un moyen d'annuler le verrouillage et de forcer le système à obéir aux ordres de Pasqal.
languages.original_text: The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.

traits.locale_text: L'ascenseur qui permet d'accéder à l'observatorium est bloqué. Pour atteindre la passerelle du vaisseau, les visiteurs vont devoir trouver un moyen d'annuler le verrouillage et de forcer le système à obéir aux ordres de Pasqal.

languages.text: 通往瞭望台的电梯被封锁住了。为了抵达舰桥，行商浪人必须想办法解除封锁，让系统服从帕斯卡的命令。
languages.original_text: The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.

traits.locale_text: 通往瞭望台的电梯被封锁住了。为了抵达舰桥，行商浪人必须想办法解除封锁，让系统服从帕斯卡的命令。

languages.text: 観察室につながるリフトが封鎖されている。訪問者が船のブリッジに到達するには、ロックダウンを解除して、システムにパスカルの命令に従わせる方法を見つけなければならない。
languages.original_text: The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.

traits.locale_text: 観察室につながるリフトが封鎖されている。訪問者が船のブリッジに到達するには、ロックダウンを解除して、システムにパスカルの命令に従わせる方法を見つけなければならない。

languages.text: Das Lift zum Observatorium ist blockiert. Um die Brücke des Schiffs zu erreichen, müssen die Besucher zunächst einen Weg finden, die Abriegelung aufzuheben — und das System dazu bringen, Pasqals Befehle anzunehmen.
languages.original_text: The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.

traits.locale_text: Das Lift zum Observatorium ist blockiert. Um die Brücke des Schiffs zu erreichen, müssen die Besucher zunächst einen Weg finden, die Abriegelung aufzuheben — und das System dazu bringen, Pasqals Befehle anzunehmen.

languages.text: El ascensor al observatorio está bloqueado. Para llegar al puente de la nave, los visitantes tendrán que encontrar la forma de levantar el bloqueo y hacer que el sistema obedezca a Pasqal.
languages.original_text: The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.

traits.locale_text: El ascensor al observatorio está bloqueado. Para llegar al puente de la nave, los visitantes tendrán que encontrar la forma de levantar el bloqueo y hacer que el sistema obedezca a Pasqal.

languages.text: Gözlemhanedeki asansör engellenmiş. Misafirler, geminin köprüsüne ulaşmak için engeli kaldırmanın ve sistemin Pasqal'ın emirlerine hizmet etmesini sağlamanın bir yolunu bulmalı.
languages.original_text: The lift up to the observatorium is blocked. To reach the ship's bridge, the visitors will have to find a way to remove the lockdown and make the system obey Pasqal's orders.
